title: Annex IV | AI Act Service Desk
text:
```markdown
# Annex IV

The technical documentation referred to in [Article 11(1)](/en/ai-act/article-11) shall contain at least the following information, as applicable to the relevant AI system:

## Table of Contents

### Recitals
[Link](/en/ai-act/recital-4)

### Chapters
#### Chapter I: General Provisions
*   [Article 1: Subject matter](/en/ai-act/article-1)
*   [Article 2: Scope](/en/ai-act/article-2)
*   [Article 3: Definitions](/en/ai-act/article-3)
*   [Article 4: AI literacy](/en/ai-act/article-4)

#### Chapter II: Prohibited AI Practices
*   [Article 5: Prohibited AI practices](/en/ai-act/article-5)

#### Chapter III: High-Risk AI Systems
##### Section 1: Classification of AI Systems as High-Risk
*   [Article 6: Classification rules for high-risk AI systems](/en/ai-act/article-6)
*   [Article 7: Amendments to Annex III](/en/ai-act/article-7)

##### Section 2: Requirements for High-Risk AI Systems
*   [Article 8: Compliance with the requirements](/en/ai-act/article-8)
*   [Article 9: Risk management system](/en/ai-act/article-9)
*   [Article 10: Data and data governance](/en/ai-act/article-10)
*   [Article 11: Technical documentation](/en/ai-act/article-11)
*   [Article 12: Record-keeping](/en/ai-act/article-12)
*   [Article 13: Transparency and provision of information to deployers](/en/ai-act/article-13)
*   [Article 14: Human oversight](/en/ai-act/article-14)
*   [Article 15: Accuracy, robustness and cybersecurity](/en/ai-act/article-15)

##### Section 3: Obligations of Providers and Deployers of High-Risk AI Systems and Other Parties
*   [Article 16: Obligations of providers of high-risk AI systems](/en/ai-act/article-16)
*   [Article 17: Quality management system](/en/ai-act/article-17)
*   [Article 18: Documentation keeping](/en/ai-act/article-18)
*   [Article 19: Automatically generated logs](/en/ai-act/article-19)
*   [Article 20: Corrective actions and duty of information]( Article )[](/en/)
```
